bullets.text: Trump issues first vetoes of second term, killing bipartisan infrastructure and water projects; accusations of political retaliation raise uncertainty for federal project funding.
Venezuela detains U.S. citizens as Washington increases pressure; escalation heightens diplomatic risk and potential impacts on oil/trade channels.
Tanker fleeing U.S. Coast Guard appears in Russian ship database, suggesting sanctions-evasion infrastructure supporting opaque oil flows.
Iran conducts widespread shutdowns amid protests and economic strain, signaling heightened domestic instability and potential regional spillovers.
Economist Mark Zandi forecasts three Fed rate cuts in H1 2026, implying faster easing than markets may price if inflation and growth soften.
China’s manufacturing PMI expands for first time since March, beating expectations and hinting at stabilization in global demand and supply chains.
$160M in export-controlled Nvidia chips allegedly smuggled into China, underscoring enforcement gaps and intensifying U.S.-China semiconductor tensions.
China criticizes Netherlands over Nexperia decisions, highlighting rising politicization of chip supply chains and regulatory risk for cross-border semiconductor deals.
AI-driven market leadership persists: Alphabet posts best year since 2009; debate grows on whether AI boom can keep lifting equities in 2026.
CME raises precious-metals margins again; gold and silver drop, illustrating how higher collateral requirements can force deleveraging and amplify price swings.
Warren Buffett steps down as Berkshire CEO after six decades, elevating succession and capital-allocation continuity as key considerations for long-term shareholders.
French insect-farming startup Ÿnsect enters liquidation after raising $600M+, signaling tougher capital markets and execution risk in alternative-protein scaling.
All-optical synthesis chip demonstrates large-scale semantic vision, pointing to faster, lower-power AI hardware paths beyond conventional electronic compute.
Researchers identify best sites to search for ancient life on Mars, refining mission targeting and increasing scientific return for future landers/rovers.
Microplastics emit “chemical clouds” into water, implying broader ecological and health exposure than particle counts alone suggest.
